original: Yasmiṁ kāmā na vasantīti yasmiṁ kāmā na vasanti na saṁvasanti na āvasanti na parivasantīti—
analyzed: yasmin kāmāḥ na vasanti iti yasmin kāmāḥ na vasanti na savasanti na āvasanti na parivasanti iti
i ca ati pada sandhi pe pada anupubba tā apeta
todeyyā ti tassa brāhmaṇassa nāmam pe abhilāpā iti

original: Taṇhā yassa na vijjatīti taṇhā yassa natthi na atthi na saṁvijjati nupalabbhati ñāṇagginā daḍḍhāti—
analyzed: taṇhā yassa na vijjati iti taṇhā yassa na atthi na atthi na sa vijjati na upalabbhati ñāṇa agginā

original: Kathaṅkathā ca yo tiṇṇoti kathaṅkathā ca yo tiṇṇo uttiṇṇo nitthiṇṇo atikkanto samatikkanto vītivattoti—
analyzed: kathaṅkathā ca yaḥ tiṇṇaḥ iti kathaṅkathā ca yaḥ tiṇṇaḥ uttiṇṇaḥ nitthiṇṇaḥ atikkanto samatikkantaḥ vītivatto ti

original: Vimokkho tassa kīdisoti vimokkho tassa kīdiso kiṁsaṇṭhito kiṁpakāro kiṁpaṭibhāgo icchitabboti vimokkhaṁ pucchatīti—
analyzed: vimokkhaḥ tassa kīdiso ti vimokkhaḥ tassa kīdisaḥ ki saṇṭhitaḥ ki pakāraḥ ki paṭibhāgaḥ icchitabbaḥ iti vimokkham pucchati iti
yasmin ti yasmin puggale arahante khīṇa asave
vatthu kāmā ca kilesa kāmā ca pe

original: Yasmiṁ kāmā na vasantīti yasmiṁ kāmā na vasanti na saṁvasanti na āvasanti na parivasantīti—
analyzed: yasmin kāmāḥ na vasanti iti yasmin kāmāḥ na vasanti na savasanti na āvasanti na parivasanti iti

original: Todeyyāti bhagavā taṁ brāhmaṇaṁ nāmena ālapati.
analyzed: todeyya iti bhagavā tam brāhmaṇam nāmena ālapati

original: Bhagavāti gāravādhivacanametaṁ …pe… sacchikā paññatti, yadidaṁ bhagavāti—
analyzed: bhagavā ati gārava adhivacanam etam pe sacchikā paññatti yat idam bhagavā ati

original: Taṇhāti rūpataṇhā saddataṇhā gandhataṇhā rasataṇhā phoṭṭhabbataṇhā dhammataṇhā.
analyzed: taṇhā ati rūpa taṇhā sadda taṇhā gandha taṇhā rasa taṇhā phoṭṭhabba taṇhā dhamma taṇhā

original: Taṇhā yassa na vijjatīti taṇhā yassa natthi na atthi na saṁvijjati nupalabbhati, pahīnā samucchinnā vūpasantā paṭippassaddhā abhabbuppattikā ñāṇagginā daḍḍhāti—
analyzed: taṇhā yassa na vijjati iti taṇhā yassa na atthi na atthi na sa vijjati na upalabbhati pahīnā samucchinnā vūpasantā paṭippassaddhā abhabbuppattikā ñāṇa agginā daḍḍhā ati

original: Kathaṅkathā ca yo tiṇṇoti kathaṅkathā vuccati vicikicchā.
analyzed: kathaṅkathā ca yaḥ tiṇṇo ti kathaṅkathā vuccati vicikicchā
dukkhe kaṅkhā pe chambhi tattam cittassa manovilekho

original: Kathaṅkathā ca yo tiṇṇoti kathaṅkathā ca yo tiṇṇo uttiṇṇo nitthiṇṇo atikkanto samatikkanto vītivattoti—
analyzed: kathaṅkathā ca yaḥ tiṇṇaḥ iti kathaṅkathā ca yaḥ tiṇṇaḥ uttiṇṇaḥ nitthiṇṇaḥ atikkanto samatikkantaḥ vītivatto ti

original: Vimokkho tassa nāparoti natthi tassa aparo vimokkho.
analyzed: vimokkho tassa na aparaḥ ti natthi tassa aparaḥ vimokkho

original: Nirāsaso so uda āsasānoti nittaṇho so, udāhu sataṇho rūpe āsīsati, sadde …pe…
analyzed: nirāsasaḥ saḥ udaḥ āsasānaḥ iti nittaṇhaḥ saḥ udāhu sataṇhaḥ rūpe āsīsati sadde pe

original: diṭṭhasutamutaviññātabbe dhamme āsīsati sādiyati pattheti piheti abhijappatīti—
analyzed: diṭṭha suta muta viññātabbe dhamme āsīsati sādiyati pattheti piheti abhijappati iti

original: Paññāṇavā soti paṇḍito paññavā buddhimā ñāṇī vibhāvī medhāvī.
analyzed: paññāṇavā so ti paṇḍitaḥ paññavā buddhimā ñāṇī vibhāvī medhāvī

original: Uda paññakappīti udāhu aṭṭhasamāpattiñāṇena vā pañcābhiññāñāṇena vā micchāñāṇena vā taṇhākappaṁ vā diṭṭhikappaṁ vā kappeti janeti sañjaneti nibbatteti abhinibbattetīti—
analyzed: paññakappī iti udāhu aṭṭha samāpatti ñāṇena vā pañca abhiññā ñāṇena vā micchā ñāṇena vā taṇhā kappam vā diṭṭhi kappam vā kappeti janeti sañjaneti nibbatteti abhinibbatteti iti

original: Atha vā aḍḍho mahaddhano dhanavātipi sakko.
analyzed: atha vai aḍḍhaḥ mahaddhanaḥ dhanavā atipi sakkaḥ

original: saddhādhanaṁ sīladhanaṁ hiridhanaṁ ottappadhanaṁ sutadhanaṁ cāgadhanaṁ paññādhanaṁ
analyzed: saddhā dhanam sīla dhanam hiri dhanam ottappa dhanam suta dhanam cāga dhanam paññā dhanam

original: satipaṭṭhānadhanaṁ sammappadhānadhanaṁ iddhipādadhanaṁ indriyadhanaṁ baladhanaṁ bojjhaṅgadhanaṁ
analyzed: sati paṭṭhāna dhanam sammappadhāna dhanam iddhipāda dhanam indriya dhanam bala dhanam bojjhaṅga dhana
magga dhanam phala dhanam nibbāna dhananti

original: Tehi anekavidhehi dhanaratanehi aḍḍho mahaddhano dhanavātipi sakko.
analyzed: tehi anekavidhehi dhana ratanehi aḍḍhaḥ mahaddhanaḥ sakkaḥ

original: Atha vā sakko pahu visavī alamatto sūro vīro vikkanto abhīrū acchambhī anutrāsī apalāyī pahīnabhayabheravo vigatalomahaṁsotipi sakko.
analyzed: atha vā sakkaḥ pahu visavī alamattaḥ sūraḥ vīraḥ vikkantaḥ abhīruḥ acchambhī anutrāsī apalāyī pahīna bhaya bheravaḥ vigata loma hasaḥ tipi sakkaḥ

original: Muniṁ ahaṁ sakka yathā vijaññanti sakka yathāhaṁ muniṁ jāneyyaṁ ājāneyyaṁ vijāneyyaṁ paṭivijāneyyaṁ paṭivijjheyyanti—
analyzed: munim aham sakka yathā vijaññanti sakka yathā aham munim jāneyyam ājāneyyam vijāneyyam paṭivijāneyyam paṭivijjheyyanti
tam me viyācikkha samanta cakkhu iti

original: Tanti yaṁ pucchāmi yaṁ yācāmi yaṁ ajjhesāmi yaṁ pasādemi.
analyzed: tanti yam pucchāmi yam yācāmi yam ajjhesāmi yam pasādemi

original: Viyācikkhāti ācikkhāhi desehi paññapehi paṭṭhapehi vivarāhi vibhajāhi uttānīkarohi pakāsehi.
analyzed: viyācikkhāti ācikkhāhi desehi paññapehi paṭṭhapehi vivarāhi vibhajāhi uttānīkarohi pakāsehi
samanta cakkhu iti samanta cakkhu vuccati sabbaññuta ñāṇam pe
tam me viyācikkha samanta cakkhu iti
paññāṇavā saḥ na ca pañña kappī

original: Nirāsaso so na ca āsasānoti nittaṇho so.
analyzed: nirāsasaḥ saḥ na ca āsasānaḥ ti nittaṇhaḥ saḥ

original: diṭṭhasutamutaviññātabbe dhamme nāsīsati na icchati na sādiyati na pattheti na piheti nābhijappatīti—
analyzed: diṭṭha suta muta viññātabbe dhamme na āsīsati na icchati na sādiyati na pattheti na piheti na abhijappati iti
paññāṇavā saḥ na ca paññakappī iti

original: Paññāṇavāti paṇḍito paññavā buddhimā ñāṇī vibhāvī medhāvī.
analyzed: paññāṇavā ati paṇḍitaḥ paññavā buddhimā ñāṇī vibhāvī medhāvī

original: Na ca paññakappīti aṭṭhasamāpattiñāṇena vā pañcābhiññāñāṇena vā micchāñāṇena vā taṇhākappaṁ
analyzed: na ca paññakappī ti aṭṭha samāpatti ñāṇena vā pañca abhiññā ñāṇena vā micchā ñāṇena vā taṇhā kappa

original: vā na kappeti diṭṭhikappaṁ vā na kappeti na janeti na sañjaneti na nibbatteti nābhinibbattetīti—
analyzed: vā na kappeti diṭṭhi kappam vā na kappeti na janeti na sañjaneti na nibbatteti na abhinibbatteti iti
paññāṇavā saḥ na ca pañña kappī

original: Munīti monaṁ vuccati ñāṇaṁ …pe… saṅgajālamaticca so muni.
analyzed: muni iti monam vuccati ñāṇam saṅga jālam aticca saḥ muni

original: Evampi todeyya muniṁ vijānāti todeyya, evaṁ muniṁ jāna paṭijāna paṭivijāna paṭivijjhāti—
analyzed: evam pi todeyya munim vijānāti todeyyaḥ evam munim jāna paṭijāna paṭivijāna paṭivijjha ati

original: Akiñcananti rāgakiñcanaṁ dosakiñcanaṁ mohakiñcanaṁ mānakiñcanaṁ diṭṭhikiñcanaṁ kilesakiñcanaṁ duccaritakiñcanaṁ.
analyzed: akiñcananti rāga kiñcanam dosa kiñcanam moha kiñcanam māna kiñcanam diṭṭhi kiñcanam kilesa kiñcanam duccarita kiñcana

original: Yassetāni kiñcanāni pahīnāni samucchinnāni vūpasantāni paṭippassaddhāni abhabbuppattikāni ñāṇagginā daḍḍhāni, so vuccati akiñcano.
analyzed: yassa etāni kiñcanāni pahīnāni samucchinnāni vūpasantāni paṭippassaddhāni abhabbuppattikāni ñāṇa agginā daḍḍhāni saḥ vuccati akiñcanaḥ
vatthu kāmā ca kilesa kāmā ca pe
kamma bhavo ca paṭisandhiko ca punabbhavaḥ pe

original: Akiñcanaṁ kāmabhave asattanti akiñcanaṁ puggalaṁ kāme ca bhave ca asattaṁ alaggaṁ
analyzed: akiñcanam kāma bhave asattam akiñcanam puggalam kāme ca bhave ca asattam a lagga

original: alaggitaṁ apalibuddhaṁ nikkhantaṁ nissaṭaṁ vippamuttaṁ visaññuttaṁ vimariyādikatena
analyzed: a laggitam a palibuddham nikkhantam nissaṭam vippamuttam visaññuttam vimariyādikatena
paññāṇavā saḥ na ca pañña kappī
satthā me bhante bhagavā sāvakaḥ ham asmi iti
